snippet: The Italian bank Monte dei Paschi di Siena confirmed earlier estimates of losses from secret transactions intended to conceal the bank’s problems.

byline.original: By JACK EWING and ELISABETTA POVOLEDO
byline.contributor: Jack Ewing reported from Frankfurt and Elisabetta Povoledo from Rome.

lead_paragraph: The Italian bank Monte dei Paschi di Siena confirmed earlier estimates of losses from secret transactions intended to conceal the bank’s problems.

headline.seo: Monte dei Paschi di Siena Admits $985 Million Loss
headline.main: Italian Bank Confirms Loss of $985 Million in Secret Deals
headline.print_headline: Italian Bank Confirms Loss of $985 Million in Secret Deals

keywords.value: Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA
keywords.name: organizations
